item.title: Finder Tips and Tricks
item.description: Default Search Location To change the default search from This Mac Under Advanced you can change the default Showing Hidden files *cmd + shift + . Show hidden files for the finder window in focus defaults write com.apple.finder AppleShowAllFiles -boolean true; killall Finder; Always show hidden files. The killall is needed for the settings to take effect. Swap the true to false to revert.
